columns.column:
Welcome to The Pit...fighter,Please\, tell me your specialty,Are you good with a weapon?,Dodge\, weave and strike quickly?,Or\, something in between?,Choose wisely fighter because your 
life depends on it,Tap the Sword to add Strength points,This will determine your Hit
Points and what weapons you 
can wield ,Tap the Shield to add Dexterity,This will determine how quick you
are and your ablity to hit your
opponent,You have 8 points to divide between
the two. Make your Choice...fighter.,When you are ready pull the switch 
to enter the Pit,Good Luck...Fighter
